alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 11:32PM CDT until June 25 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Davis County in southeastern Iowa... Northeastern Appanoose County in south central Iowa... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1132 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Unionville, or 10 miles northeast of Centerville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bloomfield, Lake Sundown, Drakesville, Unionville, Udell, Lake Wapello State Park and Bloomfield Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
